title: The Importance of Being Seven
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: watched the city go past: the Dalkeith Road with its acres of flats; the Commonwealth Pool; Arthur's Seat off to the east like a great crouching lion. Three, she thought.

title: Cruciform Mark. The strange story of Richard Tregenna, etc
author: Stephens, Riccardo.
snippet: grass by the fence before getting over, and then, circling roundBlackford Hill, with many turns and windings, and often listening for the sound of footsteps behind me, I at last broke into asteady jog trot, which I kept up for a mile, and getting into thecity again by way of the Dalkeith Road and the old HighStreet, heard a cock faintly crow in some far-off stable-yardbefore I got back. It was raining when I went out, it was raining when I camein, and my clothes were soaked through and through.
